name: eMatchopolis
overview:
eMatchopolis™ is an online dating platform provider which offers individuals the resources to easily and rapidly create and manage their own dating website. We provide our partners with website dating software, membership database, payment processing, customer support, and hosting infrastructure for their dating websites.

Have your site live within 2 business days Have an instant member’s database with real people from day one. Have a stable website with no responsibility of managing technology or the payment system. Get access to marketing tips Select pre-defined templates created for the dating industry Offer a high quality service to your members including: DateGuard (Safety, Security and Privacy features), MatchMasters (Events, Dating Advice, Matchmaker services) and matching engine

Check out our sample websites: www.ActualMatch.com www.Kipici.com

Hear what our customers are saying:

“I am beyond pleased with ematchopolis.com and most importantly, you. You have been amazing going through this with me step by step. I have wanted to own and operate a dating site for years and have found an economical way to do so…Thank you and your team for working with - and for - me. I am over and above pleased with the services.”

Kimberly, Business Owner www.findyourplusone.com
